WF3- Peptide verification/validaiton workflow

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Clinical Metaproteomics 3: Verification](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/microbiome/tutorials/clinical-mp-3-verification/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
